Class GWTSpringController

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
Deprecated. Use org.gwtwidgets.server.spring.RemoteServiceServlet from the gwt-widgets-server distribution 

public abstract class GWTSpringController
extends com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
implements org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware

Implementation of a GWT-Spring controller that forwards a request made to the doPost method.

Author:
George Georgovassilis
